metadata.title: CVE-2021-39800 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: In ion_ioctl of ion-ioctl.c, there is a possible way to leak kernel headdata due to a use after free. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-208277166References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-azure-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
